A Modern Retreat with Private Pool, Nestled in Nature's Embrace
Serene Swimming Pool under the Stars

About.title: Overview
About.des: Beautiful **Villa Panorama Istria** surrounded by **nature**. It's an ideal place to **rest** for all lovers of **peace**, **quiet**, and **nature**. Villa of **520m square** is located on a plot of **2500 m2**. You have at your disposal a beautiful **garden** and a large **lawn** for play and **entertainment** (**trampoline**, **football goals**). The villa is carefully **furnished**, with **quality furniture** and great attention to detail. **Traditional** and **modern elements** blend together to form an **interesting** whole.

the_space.title: The space
the_space.des: In front of the Villa there is a spacious summer kitchen with a wood-burning fireplace that serves for dining and entertainment (table football, piccado and billiards). Also there is a working room and a bathroom. In addition to the summer kitchen there is a **68 m square swimming pool with air massage facilities, a waterfall** . Traditional speciality is occupied by an Istrian cape built in stone style. It consists of a fire pit for setting a grill or baking for dining. It is especially attractive large terrace that spreads on one side of the villa overlooking the sea and surrounding green areas, which also makes it an ideal place for dining and resting.
the_space.des2: It consists of a spacious living room, fully equipped kitchen , **7 charming bedrooms with bathrooms, air conditioning and TV**. Heating in every room with radiators. All rooms are air conditioned. In addition to the villa, there is a wellness room ( **sauna ,jacuzzi, exercise equipment**).It is also a garage with **2 parking spaces** and there are **8 bikes**. Parking space offers the possibility of more than a dozen parking spaces.

guest_access.title: Guest Access
guest_access.des: Jacuzzi, sauna, fitness, bikes, karaoke, billiards, foosball, darts, trampoline.

locations.title: What to see and visit:
des: - Explore the beautiful islands of Brijuni National Park, rich in natural beauty and cultural heritage.
- Discover the ancient Roman amphitheater in Pula, one of the best-preserved Roman amphitheaters in the world.

- Dive into the underwater world at Pula Aquarium, located near the city center. Explore various marine habitats, observe diverse aquatic species, and learn about the importance of marine conservation.

- Experience thrilling water slides, lazy rivers, and relaxing pools at Istralandia Aquapark, located near Novigrad. Perfect for families and water enthusiasts, this aquapark offers a fun-filled day for all ages.

Tourist_Guide.subtitle: TOURIST GUIDE
Tourist_Guide.title: What to visit, see and do?

Send_Message.des: Please **send us an** answer if you would like to belong to Villa Panorama in Istria and secure your reservation?

Villa_Description.des: Stone Luxury Villa is located in Gajana, a peaceful place near Vodnjan (Dignano). This 7-bedroom villa (with en-suite bathroom in every bedroom) is perfect for nature lovers who like to relax away from the city noise. It has a lot to offer to its guests.
Villa_Description.subtitle: The Space
Villa_Description.des2: There is an outdoor swimming pool (68 m2) with a possibility of an air massage and a water cascade on the side of the pool. Spacious lawn offers a children's playground with a trampoline and football goals. Next to the pool, there is a replica of an old Istrian house called "kazun", which offers BBQ facilities. Beautiful terrace is a perfect place to enjoy your meal. Another place for dining is a summer kitchen, which is located within a game room with darts, billiard table and table football. Beauty room next to the villa offers a sauna, jacuzzi and excercising equippment. Villa has a surveillance system, which tapes the villa's surroundings and provides safety to its guests. Villa can accommodate 16 people. There are 7 bedrooms in the villa. 3 bedrooms offer a king size beds, and each of them can fit 2 people. In the rest of the bedrooms (4 of them), there are 2 single beds in each of them. Someone can also sleep on living room sofas, if they wish to.
Villa_Description.des3: Guests can access 7 bedrooms, 2 living rooms, 2 kitchens, 9 bathrooms + a separated toilet, balconies, terrace, beauty room, game room/summer kitchen, "kazun" with BBQ facilities, a room with a washing machine and ironing facilities, swimming pool, lawn, garden, children's playground and entire outdoor area (2500 m2).

Pricelist.title: Pricelist
Pricelist.subtitle: *The price refers to the period of 1 nights in Euros

Payment_conditions.subtitle: TERMS & CONDITIONS
Payment_conditions.title: Payment and booking conditions
Payment_conditions.des: Tourist tax is not included in the price!
Payment_conditions.des2: For your reservation to be secured it is obligation to pay 30% of full price in advance directly to owner of accommodation and 70% when you come to accommodation unit.
Payment_conditions.des3: Deposit refundable if all is well: 500 euros.
Payment_conditions.des4: Possibility of free cancellation one week after booking (EXCEPT IN LAST MINUTE RESERVATIONS, THEN THE DEADLINE IS 48 HOURS). Last minute - Reservation two weeks before.
Payment_conditions.des5: On the last day of the stay, the guest is obliged to leave the accommodation until 10 am, so the other guests can check in from 4 pm.
Payment_conditions.des6: Kindly note that pets are not permitted on the premises.

steps.title: Send us an inquiry
steps.des: Please send us inquiry via contact form, email or phone with all required information and period you wish to spend a vacation in holiday home Villa Relax and expect fast e-mail answer and our best offer
steps.des2: For your reservation to be secured it is obligation to pay 30% of the full amount in advance and rest of the amount on the day of arrival. After you make payment, please send us notification and we will send you confirmation of payment and booking. There are 2 options to make advance payment: bank transfer and via PayPal (debit and credit cards).
steps.subtitle: Bank Transfer
steps.des3: When payment is done, we will confirm your payment and reservation. Relax and await peacefully you vacation in summer and enjoy in your vacations in holiday home Villa Panorama, Istria - Croatia!

Environs.title: Gajana & Istria
Environs.des:
Gajana is a perfect place to experience a relaxing vacation, but it's also close enough to all kinds of activities if you change your mind. Gajana is surrounded by vineyards, olive groves, woods and a lot of beautiful sights. You can visit Kazun Park - a park with traditional Istrian houses made of stone, and it's a place with most kazun's located in one place in the Mediterranean area.
National Park Brijuni (which is visible from the villa) and Limski zaljev (Channel of Lim) are also located in this region. Since Gajana is a place surrounded by vineyards and olive groves, the best way to experience it is to take some of hiking or cycling routes through the area. Since the coast is only 5 km away, you can try fishing, sailing or diving activities. Beach, bars, restaurants and grocery shops can be found in 5 km range.
Environs.des2: You can reach the villa by car or taxi. Parking is free and available on site.
Environs.subtitle: Attractions nearby

Contact_Form.des: The content of this form will be sent directly to the e-mail address of the owner of accommodation and is used exclusively for sending inquiries about booking of listed property.
